full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA 'JAM DPAL YI SHES RAB DANG BLO 'PHEL BA ZHES BYA BA'I GZUNGS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @040B ('PHAGS PA 'JAM DPAL GYI SHES RAB DANG BLO 'PHEL BA ZHES BYA BA'I GZUNGS RDZOGS SO, ,) 'DI LTAR BGYIS PA'I RAB DKAR DGE BA'I MTHUS, ,BDAG SOGS MKHA' MNYAM MAR GYUR 'GRO RNAMS KYIS, ,SGRIB GNYIS BYANG ZHING TSOGS GNYIS RAB RDZOGS STE, ,BLA MED BYANG CHEN MYUR DU THOB GYUR CIG , ,,(CES PA 'DI NI HAL HA DZA SAG AUS DZING @041A *, ,RTA CHING RTA MGRIN SKYABS KYI HO SHO NAS, DAD BRTZON DANG LDAN DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL GYIS 'PHAGS PA 'AM DPAL GYIS DON DAM PA'I MTSAN YANG DAG PAR BRJOD PA DANG BCAS PA'I PAR GSAR BSGRUN GYIS PA'I SMON TSIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA SMIN GROL NO MIN HAN NGAG DBANG 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSOS SBYAR BA'O, ,) MANGGA LAm, ,
